channel.title: Lewis County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Lewis County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-95 South at Business US-95/To ID-62
item.description: US-95 south at the south entrance to Craigmont at Business US-95/To ID-62 junction.

item.title: US-95 South at Craigmont South Entrance
item.description: US-95 south at Business US-95 at the southern entrance to Craigmont. Use Bus. US-95 to ID-62, Nezperce, and Kamiah. Continue south on US-95 for Grangeville.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching Business US-95/To ID-62
item.description: US-95 south approaching Business US-95/To ID-62 at the southern entrance to Craigmont.

item.title: US-95 South at Craigmont Northern Entrance
item.description: US-95 south at Business US-95 at the northern entrance to Craigmont.

item.title: US-95 South at Business US-95
item.description: US-95 south approaching Business US-95 at the northern entrance to Craigmont. Use Business US-95 for Craigmont and Nezperce. Continue south on US-95 for Grangeville and Boise.

item.title: US-95 South at Lewis County Road P3
item.description: US-95 south at Lewis County Road P3 north to Reubens and Gifford.

item.title: End ID-64/ID-162 at US-12
item.description: End ID-64/ID-162 at US-12. Use US-12 west for Orofino. Use US-12 east for Kooskia and Missoula (Montana).

item.title: End ID-162 and ID-64 at US-12
item.description: End ID-162/ID-64 at US-12.

item.title: ID-162 South at ID-64
item.description: ID-162 south at ID-64. Use ID-64 west for Nezperce (via SH-64). Use ID-64/ID-162 east for Kooskia and Orofino.

item.title: ID-162 East at ID-64
item.description: ID-162 east approaching ID-64.

item.title: ID-162 East Approaching ID-64
item.description: ID-162 east approaching ID-64.

item.title: ID-64/ID-162 West at Split
item.description: ID-64/ID-162 West at Split. Both highways go to Nezperce on the Camas Prairie. ID-162 is the truck route.

item.title: ID-64/ID-162 West Approaching Split
item.description: ID-64/ID-162 West approaching ID-64/ID-162 split.

item.title: ID-162/ID-64 in Kamiah
item.description: ID-162/ID-64 west on Hill St. Turn right on 5th St. to continue on ID-162/ID-64.

item.title: US-12 West Approaching ID-64/ID-162
item.description: US-12 west at ID-162/ID-64. Use US-12 west for Orofino and Lewiston. Use ID-64/ID-162 west for Nezperce.

item.title: US-12 West approaching ID-162/ID-64
item.description: US-12 west approaching ID-162/ID-64.

item.title: ID-162 - Nezperce
item.description: ID-162 at the corner of 8th St. and Walnut St.

item.title: End ID-64 West at ID-62/ID-162
item.description: End ID-64 at ID-162 and ID-62. Continue straight for ID-62 towards Craigmont and Orofino. Turn left for ID-162 towards Grangeville.

item.title: End ID-64 at ID-62 and ID-162
item.description: End ID-64 at ID-62 and ID-162. This is the only location in the state where three state highways meet.

item.title: ID-62 East To ID-162 - Truck Information
item.description: ID-62 approaching ID-162. All Kamiah truck traffic use ID-162.

item.title: BL-95 South at ID-62 (Closeup)
item.description: Closeup of ID-62 shield at ID-62/BL-95 junction.

item.title: BL-95 South at ID-62
item.description: BL-95 south at ID-62 towards Kamiah and Nezperce. Turn left on BL-95 for US-95.

item.title: US-95 South At Cottonwood Bus. Loop
item.description: US-95 south at Bus. US-95 to Cottonwood.

item.title: US-95 South At Cottonwood Bus. Loop
item.description: US-95 south approaching Bus. US-95. This is the Cottonwood business loop.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching Bus. US-95
item.description: US-95 south approaching Bus. US-95.

item.title: US-95 North At Winchester Bus. Loop
item.description: US-95 north at Bus. US-95 north to Winchester.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching Winchester Bus. Loop
item.description: US-95 north approaching Bus. US-95 north - the Winchester business loop.

item.title: US-95 North - Interstate Trucks Secure Trip Permits
item.description: Interstate Trucks Secure Trip Permits available at the Cadillac Ranch. Most towns near state lines in Idaho have these signs.

item.title: US-95 North At Lewis County Road P3
item.description: US-95 north at Lewis County Road P3 to Reubens and Gifford.

item.title: US-95 North at Craigmont Bus. Loop
item.description: US-95 north at US-95 Bus.

item.title: US-95 North At Craigmont Bus. Loop
item.description: US-95 north at Bus. US-95 at northern end of Craigmont business loop.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching Craigmont Bus. Loop
item.description: US-95 north approaching Bus. US-95 south.

item.title: US-95 North At Craigmont Bus. Loop
item.description: US-95 north at Bus. US-95 north to Craigmont and Nezperce.

item.title: US-95 North at Bus. US-95/To ID-62
item.description: US-95 north approaching Bus. US-95/To ID-62. Bus. US-95 follows the old route of US-95 through Craigmont.

item.title: US-95 North at Bus. US-95 - Craigmont North Entrance
item.description: US-95 north at Bus. US-95 to Craigmont. Continue north on US-95 for Lewiston and Moscow.

item.title: US-95 South at BL-95
item.description: US-95 south at Bus. US-95 at northern end of Craigmont business loop.

item.title: US-95 South at BL-95
item.description: US-95 south at Bus. US-95 to Craigmont and Nezperce.

item.title: US-95 South at BL-95/ID-62
item.description: US-95 south at ID-62/Bus. US-95 to Nezperce and Kamiah.

item.title: US-95 South at BL-95/To ID-62
item.description: US-95 south at southern end of Craigmont bus. loop, Bus. US-95/ID-62 jct.
